mapper.select: SELECT p.place_id, p.place_nm , p.category ,p.place_addr ,p.place_tel ,DATE_FORMAT(p.place_in, '%H:%i') AS place_in ,DATE_FORMAT(p.place_out, '%H:%i') AS place_out ,l.loc_nm FROM place p JOIN partner partner ON p.user_id = partner.partner_id JOIN location l ON p.loc_id = l.loc_id WHERE p.status = 'active' AND partner.partner_id = 1;

SELECT p.place_id, p.place_nm ,p.category ,p.place_addr ,p.place_tel ,p.place_content ,p.created_date ,p.modified_date ,DATE_FORMAT(p.place_in, '%H:%i') AS place_in ,DATE_FORMAT(p.place_out, '%H:%i') AS place_out, l.loc_nm, pp.picture_source FROM place p JOIN place_picture pp ON p.place_id = pp.place_id JOIN location l ON p.loc_id = l.loc_id where p.place_id = #{placeid}
mapper.update: UPDATE place SET place_nm = #{place_nm}, place_addr = #{place_addr}, place_tel = #{place_tel}, place_content = #{place_content}, place_in = #{place_in}, place_out = #{place_out} WHERE place_id = #{place_id}

UPDATE place SET loc_id = CASE WHEN #{loc_nm} = '서울' THEN 1 WHEN #{loc_nm} = '경기도' THEN 2 WHEN #{loc_nm} = '강원도' THEN 3 WHEN #{loc_nm} = '경상도' THEN 4 WHEN #{loc_nm} = '전라도' THEN 5 WHEN #{loc_nm} = '충청도' THEN 6 WHEN #{loc_nm} = '제주도' THEN 7 ELSE 8 END WHERE place_id = #{place_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place ( place_nm, category, place_addr, place_tel, place_content, place_in, place_out, status, loc_id, user_id ) VALUES ( #{place_nm}, #{category}, #{place_addr}, #{place_tel}, #{place_content}, #{place_in}, #{place_out}, #{status}, #{loc_nm}, '1' );
